languages.text: {n}Проктор уважительно кивает.{/n} "Безошибочные действия. Жаль, вы служите не в Администратуме — уверен, ваш отдел был бы образцовым по эффективности и порядку".

{n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор уважительно кивает.{/n} "Безошибочные действия. Жаль, вы служите не в Администратуме — уверен, ваш отдел был бы образцовым по эффективности и порядку".

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙带着敬意点了点头。{/n}“严格遵守程序规定，值得敬佩。你不在内政部工作，这实在是太遗憾了。如果你在的话，你所在的部门应该会成为效率与秩序真正的楷模。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙带着敬意点了点头。{/n}“严格遵守程序规定，值得敬佩。你不在内政部工作，这实在是太遗憾了。如果你在的话，你所在的部门应该会成为效率与秩序真正的楷模。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne asiente con respeto.{/n} «Una adherencia meticulosa al procedimiento. Es una lástima que no sirva al Administratum; su departamento sería un verdadero ejemplo de orden y eficiencia».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne asiente con respeto.{/n} «Una adherencia meticulosa al procedimiento. Es una lástima que no sirva al Administratum; su departamento sería un verdadero ejemplo de orden y eficiencia».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un signe de tête empreint de respect.{/n} « Vous appliquez la procédure à la lettre. Quel dommage que vous n'ayez pas intégré l'Administratum. Votre département aurait été un véritable modèle en matière d'ordre et d'efficacité. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne vous adresse un signe de tête empreint de respect.{/n} « Vous appliquez la procédure à la lettre. Quel dommage que vous n'ayez pas intégré l'Administratum. Votre département aurait été un véritable modèle en matière d'ordre et d'efficacité. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは敬意を込めて頷いた。{/n}「手順を細部まで厳守するとは。あなたが帝国行政局に仕えていなくて残念です。あなたの部署こそ、効率と秩序の真の模範となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは敬意を込めて頷いた。{/n}「手順を細部まで厳守するとは。あなたが帝国行政局に仕えていなくて残念です。あなたの部署こそ、効率と秩序の真の模範となるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne saygıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Prosedüre titiz bağlılık. Administratum'da hizmet vermemen çok yazık, dairenin gerçek bir verimlilik ve düzen örneği olurdu."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne saygıyla başını sallıyor.{/n} "Prosedüre titiz bağlılık. Administratum'da hizmet vermemen çok yazık, departmanının gerçek bir verimlilik ve düzen örneği olurdu."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt respektvoll.{/n} "Penibles Befolgen der Prozedur. Schade, dass Ihr nicht im Administratum dient – Eure Abteilung wäre bestimmt ein Musterbeispiel an Effizienz und Ordnung."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne gives a nod of respect.{/n} "Meticulous adherence to procedure. It's a shame you don't serve in the Administratum — I imagine your department would be a true example of efficiency and order."
